title: Loan Details
description: Loan specifics, such as loan type, amount, rate, & term.

_id.title: Identifier
_id.description: A unique identifier for the record.

totalInterestPaid.title: Total Interest Paid
totalInterestPaid.description: Total amount of interest paid on the loan to date.

totalPrincipalPaid.title: Total Principal Paid
totalPrincipalPaid.description: Total amount of principal paid on the loan to date.

loanStatus.title: Loan Status
loanStatus.description: Indicates the current status of the loan.

termInMonths.title: Term in Months
termInMonths.description: Captures the length of the loan, in months.

annualPercentageRate.title: Annual Percentage Rate
annualPercentageRate.description: Records the annual percentage rate of the loan.

downpayment.title: Downpayment
downpayment.description: Captures the downpayment amount of loan.

interestRate.title: Interest Rate
interestRate.description: Captures the interest rate of the loan.

borrower.title: Borrower
borrower.description: Records the details for the borrower.

fees.title: Fees
fees.description: Tracks any fees or commissions applied to the loan.

gracePeriod.title: Grace Period
gracePeriod.description: Tracks the number of days a borrow has to issue a loan payment before the loan is considered to be in default.

loanType.title: Loan Type
loanType.description: Records the type of loan issued.

renegotiable.title: Renegotiable
renegotiable.description: Identifies if the loan can be renegotiated while it is still active.

collateralRequired.title: Collateral Required
collateralRequired.description: Indicates if collateral has been provided to secure the loan.
